While studying the geology

of the Andes Mountains,

Darwin discovered some seashell

fossils a few hundred meters above

sea level.

Wow, there are even shell fossils in these high mountains.

Were they

eaten and discarded

here?

The theory that mountains rose

slowly up from

the oceans is

correct!

Huh? You mean this used to be the ocean?

Exactly.

Due to some
kind of colossal force

the ocean floor rose up

to form these huge

mountains.

Wow!

If only I had such power!

Mmpphh!

Anyway, Chile is truly

a beautiful place.

105
